name: ImerShield™
description: ImerShield performance mineral synergists specially developed for flame retardant applications in polymers

name: ImerCare® 6M
description: ImerCare 6M is a sustainable French mica that delivers cohesiveness and excellent sensorial and optical properties in pressed powders such as eye shadows, blushes and face powders.

name: ImerCarb™
description: Our ImerCarb range is a cost-effective ground calcium carbonate with lower oil absorption, higher loading capacity, lower abrasion properties and a range of other benefits for adhesives and solvents.

name: ImerCoal®
description: We have developed a product that reduces the impact of explosions in coal mines, creating safer conditions for workers.

name: I-Blūm™
description: For enhanced calcium content in all kinds of foods and beverages, try our specially engineered I-Blūm line of calcium carbonate additives.
